body_html: Does this implementation use a safe way to compute LogSumExp, preventing the underflow, using the "log sum exp trick"? I could not see it in code. More info on preventing the underflow here: http://math.stackexchange.com/questions/648514/preventing-underflow-log-sum-exp-trick
